name: Integrity Trust Company, Trustee, Appellant, v. St. Rita's Building & Loan Association
name_abbreviation: Integrity Trust Co. v. St. Rita's Building & Loan Ass'n

judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaefer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
parties: Integrity Trust Company, Trustee, Appellant, v. St. Rita’s Building & Loan Association.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the Superior Court is affirmed upon the learned opinion by Judge Keller, which will be found in 112 Pa. Superior Court Reports beginning at page 343.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Wayne P. Ranibo, with him J. Channing Ellery and Robert Mam-, for appellant.
Hugh MeAnany and Andrew J. Schroder, 2d, for ap-pellee, were not heard.
casebody.head_matter:
Integrity Trust Company, Trustee, Appellant, v. St. Rita’s Building & Loan Association.
Argued January 9, 1935.
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaefer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
February 4, 1935:
Wayne P. Ranibo, with him J. Channing Ellery and Robert Mam-, for appellant.
Hugh MeAnany and Andrew J. Schroder, 2d, for ap-pellee, were not heard.
